title: Corporate Language Courseware Design and Development Using a Systems Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Fundamental Communication Skills Required in Office Environments
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based supplementary learning tools in restricted tech environments (no PC access), emphasizing practical application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic language structures (grammar/vocabulary) required in workplace environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully perform context-specific workplace communication scenarios at least three times using courseware designed via a systems approach.

Learners can perform team projects (role-play/report writing) for 2–4 weeks, deliver a 5+ minute English presentation in role-play, meet at least three out of four peer evaluation criteria, and submit a 10-page report (fewer than five grammar errors) to demonstrate integrated language skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
